lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I want my children to understand the importance of giving. I want them to understand that it does take a village and that every gesture, every gift, every moment can make a positive difference in someone's life. I give because it's the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: I help non-profits spread the word about their work (through newspapers, internet, TV, etc). I help create the image of a company and I make sure that they stay true to what they are.

lender.name: Tammy

lender.name: Lynn

lender.name: melinda

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for the help I have received, as a single mother of two, to provide a home and a decent life for my children. My daughter Julia is a lender who introduced me to Kiva as a birthday gift. In honor of all those who helped me, I want to be of help to other mothers.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse with medical training that allows me to treat pain and other problems caused by terminal illness.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I feel the best way to help others is to support their efforts to develop a skill or business with a long term goal of self-suffciency. The whole idea that you do more by teaching a man to fish (or loaning a man a fishing pole) than you do by simply giving him a fish.
lender.occupational_info: I am still a student, but when I finish, I will be practicing holistic medicine, using low risk therapies such as diet and lifestyle advice, herbal medicine, physical medicine, acupuncture and homeopathy to help improve the wellbeing of my patients.

Wow, there is no down side to this! Multi-million dollar projects like dams and roads are also needed but they alone are worthless when the individual is not also considered and made part of the equation.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: whatever the question, Love is the answer. And to loan is to Love :-)
lender.occupational_info: I create video based products of seminars, workshops and events for my clients to create massive, passive incomes using direct response marketing methods. I'm about to launch my own Business Building Club site, with part proceeds to fund Kiva projects.

lender.name: evans
lender.loan_because: small Funding opportunities to enable my organization, Oguaa Orphan Aid International conduct a Needs Assessment Survey of Orphans and Vulnerable Children in the Cape Coast Metropolis. The objective of this Survey is to identify the socio-cultural and economic factors contributions to the situations of Orphans and Vulnerable Children. The findings of the Survey will enable the organization to package a proposal to establish an innovative hospitality Orphange home to cater for the emotional, social, educational and economic needs of identified Orphans and Vulnerable Children so that they will grow up to become responsible adults in the society. At the moment the organization is constrained on financial resource and logistics since it relies on its internal resource. Oguaa Orphan Aid International is committed to networking with both local and foreign NGOs.Research Institutions and individual students who are conducting post graduate and PHD Research on Children.
lender.occupational_info:
OGUAA ORPHANAID INTERNATIONAL is a Christian base humanitarian organization. it is non partisan, non governmental and non profit making venture founded in the year 2002 in response to the need of helping alleviate and transform the lives of the deprived ones, vulnerable and poverty-stricken children, families and societies by tackling educational, developmental and health related issues. Through the placement of volunteer programs. OUR MISSION To provide support and resource to meet and sustain social, physical and emotional needs of deprived and vulnerable children in the society. AIMS AND OBJECTIVES.
(i) To advocate for the promotion and protection of the youth, needy and the less privileged. (ii) To provide a comprehensive and progressive training for the needy and the less privileged youths to prepare them for the future. (iii) To unearth and develop the needy and less privileged youth to reach their full potentials. (iv) To help promote, collaborate and co ordinate with government, other non governmental organization and the private sector to improve upon the quality of lives of the people. (v) To embark on educational campaigns from time to time to help check chronic and sexually transmitted diseases. (STD).
HOW WE WORK The organization believes that there are still capable and potential people in the local communities who just need the required support and resources to make it to the top. With our international volunteer placement programmes.the organization works in consultation with the various leaders of the local communities. And private sector organization who show positive social corporate responsibility in reaching the targeted people.

lender.name: Brendan
lender.loan_because: I feel i am in a very privileged position compared to a great deal of people in the rest of the world. My whole country is. Sadly our politicians and big companies are increasing the gap between the rich and the poor, which is very wrong. This is my very small contribution to change it a little bit.
lender.occupational_info:
I make calculations on investments. The company I work for invests in Wind Energy. I am 50% owner of the company.
Energy without the: political problems polution wars global warming price risks etc

lender.occupational_info: I work for a train transit company. I use computers to send information and instructions to the operator of the trains.

lender.loan_because: Even though we have a simple lifestyle our life is easier and more secure than a majority of others.
lender.occupational_info: I take photoraphs and build web sites for all sorts of businesses.

lender.name: Erica
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small publishing company called Kumarian Press. We publish books on microcredit, development, human rights, and NGOs, among other things.

lender.name: Karyn
lender.loan_because: i can and should.
lender.occupational_info: i paint in bright, vibrant colors - filling my canvases with movement and pattern.

lender.name: Giovanna
lender.loan_because: I think this is the best way to change our world to a better one.

lender.name: PIETRO
lender.loan_because: i love all people in the world.
lender.occupational_info: i sell tiles and other items for building house

lender.name: Ifurita
lender.loan_because: The rich people open his hands to give rather than the poor people who often fist to prevent loss.

lender.name: Huw Williams
lender.loan_because: I know how lucky I am being born in a rich European country. I enjoy travelling and have seen my share of povety and suffering. As a result I think poverty is a human rights issue and I want to do my part by lending money through Kiva to empower those who wouldnt normally have access to the kinds of opportunities we in the West have. I also find the whole lending process fun... apart from the chosing who to loan to that is, I find that kinda stressfull! So many choices!!!
lender.occupational_info: Born in Wales, moved to England when I was 17 for college and then Canada when I was 25, lived there for 10 years and I am now back in London since 2005.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe in not just giving money to people, but empowering them to work and lift themselves out of poverty.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: it's fun!

lender.name: Jaap Verduijn
lender.loan_because: I have no excuse not to.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an eccentric autist, an almost total autodicact, an old age pensioner, and a firm but amused believer that our Earth is an interplanetary madhouse for the criminally insane.

lender.name: Sven
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: It's wonderful to help others!
lender.occupational_info: I work at the Make-A-Wish Foundation. I have worked for non-profits for about six years. When I graduate from college, I plan on becoming a Social Worker.

lender.name: Marianne
lender.occupation: English As a Second Language Teacher
lender.loan_because: ....it feels right. It encourages self-reliance. It affects a family, not just an individual. Perhaps even a community.
lender.occupational_info: I teach adult immigrants English and skills to live in the United States. We work hard everyday. My students come from all over the world and they bring joy to my life.

lender.name: Britteny
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a medical device company that helps save lives around the world.

lender.name: Marcelo
lender.loan_because: Micro lending will change the world!
lender.occupational_info: I wouldn't begin to try!

lender.name: Casper Joost
lender.loan_because: Tony parked the rental car in the wrong place at the wrong time
lender.occupational_info: Software development

lender.name: teena
lender.loan_because: i want to do something meaningful to help someone else. I think kiva is an amazing opportunity for everyone. Thanks!
lender.occupational_info: I spend my days with my son Hayden. We are a homeschooled family in B.C Canada and we garden, read,swim,play tennis and have fun together.

lender.name: Lorraine
lender.loan_because: to share my blessings, to reach out and help
lender.occupational_info: I help people feel better

lender.name: Krishnaiah
lender.loan_because: Want to help.
lender.occupational_info: Medical doctor

lender.name: hayden
lender.loan_because: i think it is a great way to help people and get the money back to lend to other people.
lender.occupational_info: i like to type on my typewriter and read.

lender.name: Amanda & Eric
lender.loan_because: microfinance is tremendously important. We're happy to do what we can.

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: economic progress ends human suffering. Best of luck to the Kiva entrepreneurs!

lender.name: Thea
lender.loan_because: I feel good giving because I was adopted from Cambodia
lender.occupational_info: I am in the 3rd grade

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: We live in an unfair world in which geography determines quality of life. Kiva loans are what I can directly do to change the world, and be the change I want to see in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach individual how to think rigorously and use the appropriate tools.

lender.name: sara
lender.loan_because: There is nothing better than sharing and helping out others. When the money is paid back it can be loaned again to help the next person. It is the best kind of recycling.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small art studio and gallery. I teach pottery classes to children and adults. I make pottery, jewelry and quilts.

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: its kinda tight
lender.occupational_info: studying

lender.name: Thor Ivar
lender.loan_because: I love the concept of micro financing.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: "Capital, created by the labour of the worker, crushes the worker, ruining small proprietors and creating an army of unemployed." -Vladimir Lenin
lender.occupational_info: Restoration of historic homes.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I saw Kiva on PBS and I felt like I had finally found something that I could do to help! I am so proud this is a San Francisco company!
lender.occupational_info: I write instruction that tell people how to perform their job.

lender.name: Rev Elaine
lender.loan_because: I want to be part of the solution to poverty. Everyone deserves a chance and if I can help - that's great!
lender.occupational_info: I am trained to serve people of all faiths and none. My job is to help people connect with that part of themselves that is good and true. We can call it God, or the name you give it. Some of these people are terminally ill, or lonely, or have mental health problems. I also do weddings for couples of different faiths, as well as other rites of passage including funerals.

lender.name: Faust
lender.loan_because: To try and make a difference,even if it is small.
lender.occupational_info: Electronics.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: traditional financial aid channels often produce less than ideal results

lender.name: Valerio
lender.loan_because: I used to donate money from time to time but i was not really pleased with this kind of help. With Kiva i can somehow get in touch with people needing money. I can encourage them to trust their business and help the society they live in accordingly.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur myself i work as an IT consultant for a multinational company.

lender.name: mskathym
lender.occupation: Real Estate Sales/Owner of Home Cleaning Business
lender.loan_because: I work very hard for everything I have. I was a single parent and struggled for years. Someone lent me a small sum of money for a downpayment on my first home ($1500) and it changed my life. I hope my small contribution can help change someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell homes as I am a licensed Realtor in the state of Florida. I also have a residential cleaning busness. I have 2 employees for the cleaning business. I also take care of a 93 year old man in my home and employ 2 people to assist in that. I also employ one person who does commercial office cleaning. My husband is a landscaper and works every day. He is also enrolled in college to become a nurse. He is originally from Hungary and works very hard to be a success. We wish everyone much success. "You Earn What You Think You Are Worth"

lender.name: N!cklas
lender.loan_because:
I believe this is a good way to make a change.
Everyone can do something to make a change - what are you doing?

lender.name: Jonas Nockert
lender.loan_because: I like to help out. Kiva enables me to do so in a direct and personal way.
lender.occupational_info: I try to make it easier, more efficient and more fun for people to achieve what they want to achieve.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute to the transformative process that can happen within people and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: My intention is to create beautiful jewelry through pure craftsmanship and simplicity of design where adornment connects disparate people through common stories.

lender.name: Noah Williamsson
lender.loan_because: It's simple to make a difference

lender.name: Ink Blot Arts
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: We are a student run theatre company at Chico State.

lender.name: Primebin.com
lender.loan_because:
As an organization that provides services to small businesses in North America, we see it fitting that we aid and support aspiring entrepreneurs throughout the world.
We loan because we have a genuine love for 'free enterprise' in our hearts. Primebin was established with this principle as our bedrock, and we're proud to support Kiva with all the extraordinary work they do.
lender.occupational_info: Primebin provides warehousing and distribution outsourcing in small scale B2B, mail-order and online store environments. Through state-of-the-art warehousing and shipping technology methods, we receive, store, and ship your business inventory at a fraction of the cost of setting up your own brick-n-mortar facility.

lender.name: Seth
lender.loan_because: Empowering other people to achieve financial independence and follow their dreams reaffirms my own mission to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I work with video to communicate ideas and emotions.

lender.name: jordan
lender.occupational_info: Being a kid is fun!

lender.name: Noah Fleming
lender.loan_because:
I'm an aspiring entrepreneur. I'm no different from any one of these people except for some weird reason I was born on the opposite side of the planet where opportunity is abundant.
I love that Kiva gives me the opportunity to help those who are less fortunate, but have that same burning entrepreneurial drive.
I hope my loans can help make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Noah is a strategic marketing expert specializing in membership retention strategies. Since 2005 he has worked with over 500 online marketers to help them optimize their retention and profits. Noah lives with his wife and their new daughter in Ontario, Canada.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for the opportunities and help I have been given in my life and I want to provide the same to others who are capable of improving the lives of themselves and those around them. I believe microfinance is a way to do this in a very powerful and sustainable manner.
lender.occupational_info: Healthcare Operations

lender.name: Sheri
lender.loan_because: I enjoy supporting the spirit and success of entrepreneurs all around this beautiful world. Dream big!
lender.occupational_info: I produce public events and entertainment - everything from cultural events, childrens performers, to dance, to fireworks shows to concerts. My dream is to own my own business someday, as well.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: The way to make a difference is helping one person at a time to become self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: Striving to make sure that the law is applied fairly to everyone.

lender.name: RFPJ
lender.loan_because: Like to help !!!
lender.occupational_info: Fun

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I want to lend a hand to others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people take risks by protecting against things going wrong.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I have. Others have not.
lender.occupational_info: I help teenagers grow in their relationship with God and one another.

lender.name: Trey
lender.loan_because: we all need a little help from time to time.

lender.name: Karla
lender.loan_because: I admire entrepreneurship. I admire people who have the courage to pursue their dreams. And, because a small loan can truly change somebody's life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a stay-at-home Mom to three kids. I used to work in global marketing and competitive intelligence for a large medical device company.

lender.name: syaiful
lender.loan_because: ingin mengembangkan usaha peternakan ayam pedaging sehingga bisa menciptakan lapangan pekerjaan untuk masyarakat disekitar saya.
lender.occupational_info: peternak dan seorang dokter hewan

lender.name: Birgitta
lender.loan_because: It makes sense

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: I want to and I can.

lender.name: Alina
lender.loan_because: I love to see people improve their living standards for themselves and their familes

lender.name: julie and harold
lender.loan_because: without loans people may not reach their potential.
lender.occupational_info: We own a pizza restaurant and bowling alley.

lender.name: Lutria
lender.loan_because: if we share what we have, world will be rich
lender.occupational_info: I do my very best!

lender.name: Fabian
lender.loan_because: I love the way Kiva connects two of the most democratizing innovations humanity created, the microloans and the Internet.

lender.name: Roberto
lender.loan_because: I can contribute to other people's dreams, ambitions and wealth creation for a better well being.
lender.occupational_info: I help people identify their career and work goals

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I want to give to people who work hard the opportunity the opportunity to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student.

lender.name: Padre Andrew
lender.loan_because: "We love because He first loved us!" What a great way to display God's love and to make a difference in the lives of ordinary people!
lender.occupational_info: I work as a priest and minister with the British Royal Air Force - caring for those who are trying to make a difference bringing peace in some of the world's trouble spots - and back home in the UK.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: it helps other to get better and stay better.
lender.occupational_info: I find solution for other's business needed something stable and running for years to come.

lender.name: Rogers
lender.loan_because: I believe in hard work, determination and persistence, all traits seemingly embodied by the Kiva borrowers. So, if all it takes is a little capital to help them grow, I'm in.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a portfolio of startup companies based in the United States. I love entreprenuers, regardless of their origin, location or age.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Jillian
lender.loan_because: I want to give back the abundance that I have been given.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer and a teacher at this point, but as a human being, I am constantly trying to learn about others.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: I want to help others in the world.

lender.name: All Star Kids
lender.loan_because: we believe in supporting people in Africa in a self sustaining way.
lender.occupational_info: All Star Kids believe that all children have the right to be free from hunger, need, neglect and abuse.

lender.name: jacob
lender.loan_because: small entrepreneurs make the most of the world and are lighter on the earth

lender.name: Shane
lender.loan_because: I believe everybody needs a chance and I admire people who attempt do do things for themselves and better themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I run my own software business.

lender.name: james
lender.loan_because: I want to see people breaking free from poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I lead and start churches.

lender.name: Kristy & Tiago
lender.loan_because: We want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse in a London hospital. I look after patients recovering from surgery.

lender.name: sam
lender.loan_because: I hope it may make a small difference to a the life of a human being in times of hardship
lender.occupational_info: I am a 19 yr old English Student, currently completing my history/politics degree in Philadelphia, USA.

lender.name: Dr. Ali York
lender.occupational_info:
Of primary importance to the MOER Foundation, Inc., is ensuring that we, as a global community, can learn to live with, by and for each other.
The mission of the MOER Foundation, Inc. is to identify and create economic opportunities, education and social support to individuals and families for the enrichment of the global community. The principal motivation of the MOER Foundation, Inc., is to ensure that our global community's safety and security are a result of respect, cooperation, and an enhanced acceptance that we are one Family.

lender.name: Smitha
lender.loan_because: I think this is a fantastic way to support people less fortunate than us!!!
lender.occupational_info: The best job in the world.Being a Mum!!!:)

lender.name: The LEAP Foundation
lender.loan_because: By making micro-loans to female entreprenuers in developing areas, the LEAP Foundation hopes to join many other charity based organizations that grant micro-loans to deserving borrowers worldwide. By helping them grow and expand their own endeavors, LEAP can empower women to take control of their own futures by enabling them to continually focus on the growth necesasary to sustain long term productivity. We hope to become a key element to helping these women create and sustain wealth for themselves, their families, and their communities by helping them with capital to which they otherwise would have no access.

lender.name: Johanna
lender.loan_because: I believe in random acts of kindness. I chose Elice's Haradadi Group because I would like to help women lead more independent lives and I once had a clothing business myself.
lender.occupational_info: As a high school librarian I help young people find the information they need to complete their school projects.

lender.name: Janette
lender.loan_because: I have been homeless, needed a helping hand but didn't find it and believe that no matter what your past is, everybody deserves a break, a moment of trust, and hope that with a small step they can start their own marathon etc. For me was a loan to buy a new motorbike but was refused, struggled but managed, if I'd had a loan I would have got there quicker!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Lawyer's office, I am the accounts manager, care for client's money and manage the running costs of the firm, and send bills out to folk, and make sure the partners don't overspend. all money money money - ride a gsxR750 SRAD "Roger" and a gsxr750 K4 "Beeeze" and I love them both :-) an Arctophile and slightly crazy, LOVE british real ale... yum yum

lender.name: Franco & Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It helps in the eradication of poverty and can create economic stability for individuals and their community. It's amazing how $25 can change the trajectory of someone's life.

lender.name: Ed Byrne
lender.loan_because: I have a great life, an amazing family, a job I love and everything I need to live comfortably. I can spare enough to make a difference for the better in the lives of those born to less fortunate circumstances, and in turn let them help others. That's a pretty amazing thing!
lender.occupational_info: I help guide teams of people who create videogames and make sure the games are as fun as they can be.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky to be living in the UK.

lender.name: CCMLJ
lender.loan_because: We have been looking at ways to help others. This is a great program and teaches our children a valuable lesson... "Because I have been given much, I too must give."
lender.occupational_info: Busy taking care of our 5 children and home! Lots of cooking, cleaning and running around.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I like to help others.

lender.name: M Jean
lender.loan_because: Historically there has been a huge transfer of wealth from nations across the globe to industrial and post-industrial societies. This is a small way to reverse the flow.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and study political science and history.

lender.name: Svet
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance and i'm fortunate enough to be able to help

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: My great uncle gives me a 100 dollar check every year for christmas, and I wanted to be able to write him something meaningful in the thank you card.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people and make this world a better place :-)
lender.occupational_info: I look after & fix the equipment that is used to control the movement of trains.

lender.name: Morten
lender.loan_because: I like helping people directly
lender.occupational_info: I run a garbage company

lender.name: Rune Andreas
lender.loan_because: Trying to make the world a better place.. Sounds cheesy...

lender.name: Eilef
lender.loan_because: I can, Yes We Can!
lender.occupational_info: Sales Professional

lender.name: Morten
lender.loan_because: I want to see my money doing something good for others. It's a privilege to share my blessings
lender.occupational_info: In addition to my work as a fulltime teacher, I've just started my own business. I'm selling health products. Some of the profit from this business I want to put into action through Kiva.

lender.name: Arthur
lender.loan_because: I love seeing people who care making changes in the world

lender.name: Emilie
lender.loan_because: I think its the best way to help directly and I know where and who gets it. I also think it helps long term.
lender.occupational_info: I sell airplane tickets for traveling

lender.name: Ponita
lender.loan_because: I specially want to help single hard working mothers in Africa - so that they can send their children to school. The children is our future!
lender.occupational_info: Customers service at a florist headquarters.

lender.name: Geir
lender.loan_because: I might need one myself one day!

lender.name: Gunnar
lender.loan_because: It's little for me, huge for someome else.
lender.occupational_info: I work, selling engines for big ships, all around the world.

lender.name: Anders
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by self starters
lender.occupational_info: I would describe my work as helping people find a new job

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I just watched a program on TV and the concept was real easy to understand. I like the Idea helping someone get a business going.

lender.name: Wenche & Ralph
lender.loan_because: We hope the loan can make a change

lender.name: Hilda & Fredrik
lender.loan_because: It is a pleasure to be able to help people who are less fortunate than we are.

lender.name: Veelsmyra22
lender.loan_because: I think it is the best way to help

lender.name: Aslak
lender.loan_because: If not me, who? If not now, when?

lender.name: Trond
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: gilly
lender.loan_because: I want to help give families a better life, and access to fair loans. I hope to make a difference to someone's life.

lender.name: Per R. Flood
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to live in a very rich country and like to assist hard working people in poor countries to a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I have spent a lifetime studying the small plants and animals that constitute the food source of fishes.

lender.name: Ole Christian
lender.occupation: F-16 Weapon Spesialist - Royal Norwegian Air Force
lender.loan_because: I get a good feeling, knowing I can help other people improve their quality of life.

lender.name: Henrik
lender.loan_because: I heard about Kiva through the frontlineworld documentary. It really touched me as a splendid idea! An idea that everybody gains something from. So I decided to participate.
lender.occupational_info: At the moment I am writing a master thesis in ethnomusicology, in the subject of saami music. I live in a little, beautiful town called Troms√∏, way up north in Norway. My future goal is to become a musicteacher and a parttime musician.

lender.name: Mats
lender.loan_because: it helps
